item.title: Need help with a Compile ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

This is the compile error I got after following a barrows minigame tut.

[code]NPCHandler.java:703: ‘;’ expected
client ppl = (client)
^
NPCHandler.java:716: ‘;’ expected
client ppl = (client)
^
NPCHandler.java:732: ‘;’ expected
client ppl = (client)
^
NPCHandler.java:1238: not a statement
client ppl = (client); server.playerHandler.play
ers[Player];

^
NPCHandler.java:1243: not a statement
client ppl = (client); server.playerHandler.play
ers[Player];

^
NPCHandler.java:1248: not a statement
client ppl = (client); server.playerHandler.play
ers[Player];

^
NPCHandler.java:1253: not a statement
client ppl = (client); server.playerHandler.play
ers[Player];

^
NPCHandler.java:1258: not a statement
client ppl = (client); server.playerHandler.play
ers[Player];

^
NPCHandler.java:1263: not a statement
client ppl = (client); server.playerHandler.play
ers[Player];

^
NPCHandler.java:1690: ‘;’ expected
client ppl = (client)
^
10 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
